name: Looming Despair
description:
A survival card game made for the 2021 Spooktober Game Jam! This is both my first game jam, and my first uploaded game, so I'm a bit nervous.
A lot of ideas were stripped out, but I believe the core gameplay is still decent ^^

Thank you for taking the time to try this game, and I hope you enjoy it!

If I can get WEBGL to work, I will update this with that implemented.

credit to zapslat.com for audio!

Known bugs:
Sometimes when the last person dies, and there are no cards left to pull, the game over screen does not appear. I'm not quite sure what is causing this, but I will try to iron it out soon.

Features that are yet to be added:
- Equippable items 

- Way to bring back people
